message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's the fairest way to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you, Alice?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I also need a fair share. Let's compromise.
Inflation is hitting me harder, Alice. I need a bigger share to make up for it.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. We need to reach an agreement before the inflation takes even more of our money!
